OOC: Groan now this is going to be pointless.  Oh well nothing better to do.  
Kinger we need to talk about what to do with the duplicate Guiledarts now.

::Cygnar::
    He was studying the egg when it began to move.  It slowly opened 
revealing a new Guiledart.  He would be useful.  Then he received the message 
reporting that, among other things, the original Guiledart was back.  
"Interesting.  I'll call you NeoGuile for now.  Come along NeoGuile.  We're 
going to meet yourself."  He replies to the message from Apocalypse.  "This 
is second in command Cygnar.  I am coming to your position with a... friend 
of yours.  I think you'll know him."  He takes off for the new position with 
NeoGuile following him.
